pullRequest.title: Bounded Staleness and Consistent Prefix - Read My Writes CI
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enabled Bounded Staleness and Consistent Prefix - Read My Writes CI - Tcp and Https
Fixes conversion of bounded staleness and consistent prefix because of this error:

2020-02-26T19:22:18.1834268Z [ERROR] Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 5.971 s <<< FAILURE! - in TestSuite

2020-02-26T19:22:18.1849939Z com.beust.jcommander.ParameterException: Value BOUNDED_STALENESS can not be converted to ClientType. Available values are: [ReadThroughput, WriteThroughput, ReadLatency, WriteLatency, QueryInClauseParallel, QueryCross, QuerySingle, QuerySingleMany, QueryParallel, QueryOrderby, QueryAggregate, QueryAggregateTopOrderby, QueryTopOrderby, Mixed, ReadMyWrites]
2020-02-26T19:22:18.1892136Z 	at com.azure.cosmos.benchmark.ReadMyWritesConsistencyTest.readMyWrites(ReadMyWritesConsistencyTest.java:128)
2020-02-26T19:22:18.1893300Z

commit.message: Enabling Bounded Staleness and Consistent Prefix on Read My Writes Strong Account for both Tcp and Https

nodes.bodyText: please use Linux as the OS image. here and elsewhere in the new bounded-staleness and consistent prefix tests
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -211,13 +211,37 @@ jobs:
           ProfileFlag: '-Pe2e'
           AdditionalArgs: '-DargLine="-Dcosmos.directModeProtocol=Https"'
           DESIRED_CONSISTENCY: 'Strong'
+        Bounded_Staleness_Https_E2E:
+          DisplayName: Bounded Staleness Single Region ReadMyWrites
+          OSVmImage: 'windows-2019'
+          ProfileFlag: '-Pe2e'
+          AdditionalArgs: '-DargLine="-Dcosmos.directModeProtocol=Https"'
+          DESIRED_CONSISTENCY: 'BoundedStaleness'
+        Consistent_Prefix_Https_E2E:
+          DisplayName: Consistent Prefix Single Region ReadMyWrites
+          OSVmImage: 'windows-2019'

commit.message: Fixed ReadMyWrites consistency test for BoundedStaleness and Consistent Prefix
Removed consistent_prefix Read My Writes as consistency promise in not sufficient to view writes
